item.title: How to Add a Custom Domain to your Github Pages Website
item.description: If you are anything like me, then you’ve had to link a custom domain to your Github Pages site. But, if you are me reading this in the future, then you’ll know that I do this so rarely that I forget how to do it every time, which always ends up with me spending valuable time researching this for the nth time. Combined with the long-term nature of DNS propagation and the fact that I won’t get to see if what I did worked for up to 24 hours, I often get stressed when it doesn’t work out the way it should!
